DESCRIPTION: Secure, private, open-source, and fast. Don't choose one of them, choose all of them.
VERIFICATION_DESCRIPTION: Are you a human? We're sure you are, but we need to make sure.
LOGGED_IN: You have logged in successfully. Please wait while you are redirected to your destination.
ALREADY_LOGGED_IN: You are already logged in. Please wait while you are redirected to your destination.
ENTER_CODE: Please enter the verification code generated by your authenticator app.
USER_EXISTS: An account with this email already exists
USER_MISMATCH: This account does not match the email you entered
INCORRECT_CODE: The code you entered is incorrect
SESSION_EXPIRED: Session expired, please reload the page
EMAIL_MISCONFIGURED: Email is not enabled on this server
RATE_LIMITED: Too many attempts, please try again later
TIMED_OUT: Unable to reach the server, please try again later
UNKNOWN_ERROR: An unknown error occurred, please try again later
WEAK_PASSWORD: Password is too weak, please add a variety of characters
LONG_DISPLAY_NAME: Display name must be 64 characters or less
INVALID_USERNAME: Usernames must be 3-32 characters long and can only contain Latin letters, numbers, underscores, hyphens, and periods
ACCOUNT_SERVICES_COPYRIGHT: Copyright Â© {} Nextania Cloud Technologies and contributors.
ESCALATION_REQUIRED_DESCRIPTION: To manage your account, you must authenticate again.
MFA_DESCRIPTION: Two-factor authentication is highly recommended to secure your account.
PASSKEYS_DESCRIPTION: You can use passkeys to securely log in to your account without a password. These can include biometric data, physical security keys, and other methods.
PASSKEYS_WARNING: Heads up! Our passkey system uses discoverable credentials. Please be mindful that some security keys may not be able to delete them.
DELETE_ACCOUNT_DESCRIPTION: This will permanently delete your account and all associated data. This action cannot be undone.
CONFIRM_DELETION_DESCRIPTION: Are you sure you want to delete your account and all associated data?
LOGOUT_ALL_DESCRIPTION: This will log you out of all active sessions except the current one. You will need to log in again on all other devices.
LOGGED_OUT_SUCCESS: You have logged out successfully. Thank you for using our services and have a wonderful day.
MFA_SETUP_SECRET: Scan the QR code or enter the following secret into your preferred authenticator app.
MFA_SETUP_BACKUP: Save these one-time backup codes in a safe place. You can use them to log in if you lose access to your authenticator app.
MFA_SETUP_NEVER_SHOWN_AGAIN: These codes will never be shown again, so please store them securely.
